record.name: Margherita Pizza
record.description: Classic Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce on a thin crust. A timeless favorite that showcases the simplicity and elegance of Italian cuisine.

record.name: Spicy Thai Curry
record.description: Authentic Thai curry with coconut milk, basil, and fresh vegetables. A perfect balance of spicy, sweet, and aromatic flavors.

record.name: American Burger
record.description: Juicy grilled beef patty with fresh lettuce, tomato, pickles, and special sauce. Served with crispy fries.

record.name: Sushi Platter
record.description: Assorted fresh sushi rolls with premium ingredients. Includes California roll, spicy tuna, salmon, and vegetable rolls.

record.name: Falafel Wrap
record.description: Crispy falafel with hummus, lettuce, tomato, and tahini sauce wrapped in warm pita bread.
